name: Vertigo Semi Truck Driving: Impossible Tracks
name_original: Vertigo Semi Truck Driving: Impossible Tracks
description:
Vertigo Semi Truck Driving: Impossible Tracks is a free 3D truck driving games. It follows a theme of Impossible Tracks where you have to carefully balance your vehicle midair. This is a difficult trek completed with semi-trucks on mid-air ramps where there is nothing beneath the ridges. This Is a sky high game where there are different hurdles you have to pass. There are moving ramps, floating bridges, tunnels etc. There are several levels to choose from; every level is difficult from the previous one and is more exciting. The challenge is to finish the game; a toddler or a kid can also complete one or two mission. Missions in the start are easy and as you progress levels become difficult. If you have phobia for Alturas, then fight your phobia and fears and play this thrilling game. Calm your nerves and focus on your semi-truck don’t let it fall. There are several heavy wheel truck-s you can choose from.

This game is very addictive and challenging you have to drive impossible tracks; you have to be super truck drive. Vertigo Semi Truck Driving: Impossible Tracks has crazy impossible tracks you have to be careful while twisting and turning on the ramps. There are several heavy wheel truck but they are all priced and you have to unlock them by earning coins. There are 15 plus levels to choose from but they are all looked except the first one and a level only unlocks when you have finished the previous ones. This game has great animations and user interface keeping the usability and acceptability norms of the users. The ramps are massive and are placed on great height. You have to watch your acceleration and don’t make the mistake of giving too much speed to the semi-truck and falling off the ridge. The environment is relaxing and soothing and uses colors that are pleasing to the eyes. This game targets every age group form toddler to kids to adults. At the start of the game the camera guides you through the path from starting point to the destination where you have to reach.

The concept of the game is give an experience of semi-truck driving on great heights, narrow paths, moving planks and sharp turns. Open the game you will be given by different choices, press start and go to the level selection screen select an unlocked level then select an unlocked truck and press start. Voila you have started the game now you are placed on an Xtreme heighted ramp and you have to reach your destination. The whole level is set skyhigh above the tallest tower above the mountains so be careful and don’t let your height phobia get the better of you and don’t falldown.

How to Play
• Go through the mission path and select a mission
• Select a heavy wheel truck
• Overview the track
• Manage your time so that you can reach destination in time.
• Finish the level and move on to the next level
• Buy semi-truck from the garage
• You can also buy fuel upgrades from the shop to have a better chance in completing the mission.

Game Features
• Soothing and calming colors
• Great UI for better user interaction
• Cool semi-trucks
• Fuel upgrades
• Multiple levels
• Great Environment

This is a truck games to play free with driving semi-trucks on impossible tracks being the theme of the game. This is different from rest of the games as it is a boy truck games free. This is one of the new truck games available on the store. So don’t just pass by and miss the chance to play on of the best free truck games of this year.
